getCurrentValuation().details: Retrieves the current valuation of the equity.

returns._0: The D/E ratio as a string.

getLaunchValuation().details: Retrieves the launch valuation of the equity.

getOffChainPriceStatus().details: Retrieves the status of off-chain pricing.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether off-chain pricing is enabled.

getPreviousValutaion().details: Retrieves the previous valuation of the equity.

getToken().details: Retrieves the token address associated with this equity configuration.

setValuation(uint256,string).details: Updates the valuation of the equity.

params.actionID: A unique identifier for the update action.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.
